title: NontextualAnnotation
description: Inline text that has a non-textual annotation.
$comment:
Use cases include annotating spelling errors, denoting proper names in Chinese text,
representing underline text, and other forms of annotation. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/u

type.$comment:
This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.
It is extended with the titles of all descendant types during
the generation of schema.json files.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.
